snippet: Jason Kidd, who was set to rejoin Dallas, made a late and stunning reversal and agreed to join the Knicks instead, while Jeremy Lin agreed to an offer sheet with Houston.
abstract: New York Knicks sign veteran point guard Jason Kidd, who was set to rejoin the Dallas Mavericks, but made a stunning reversal; Knicks turn their focus to keeping young guard Jeremy Lin, who, meanwhile, agrees to an offer sheet with the Houston Rockets.
lead_paragraph: Jason Kidd, who was set to rejoin Dallas, made a late and stunning reversal and agreed to join the Knicks instead, while Jeremy Lin agreed to an offer sheet with Houston.

headline.seo: Jason Kidd Chooses Knicks Over Mavericks
headline.main: Knicks Get Kidd and Make Plans to Keep Lin
headline.print_headline: Knicks Get Kidd And Make Plans To Keep Lin
